Class RestClient<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.RestClient<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountDataRestClient, BingRulesRestClient, CallRestClient, CryptoRestClient, EventsRestClient, GroupsRestClient, LoginRestClient, PresenceRestClient, ProfileRestClient, PushersRestClient, RoomsRestClient, ThirdPidRestClient

    public class RestClient<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for making Matrix API calls.

        public RestClient(HomeServerConnectionConfig hsConfig,
                  java.lang.Class<T> type,
                  java.lang.String uriPrefix,
                  boolean withNullSerialization,
                  boolean useIdentityServer)
        Public constructor.
        Parameters:
        hsConfig - the home server configuration.
        type - the REST type
        uriPrefix - the URL request prefix
        withNullSerialization - true to serialise class member with null value
        useIdentityServer - true to use the identity server URL as base request
